doc:
Madge Bellamy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madge_Bellamy 0 Madge Bellamy (June 30, 1899 – January 24, 1990) was an American stage and film actress. She was a popular leading lady in the 1920s and early 1930s. Her career declined in the sound era, and ended following a romantic scandal in the 1940s. Madge_Bellamy ( June_30_,_1899 – January_24 , 1990 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress . She was a_popular_leading_lady in the_1920s and early_1930s . Her_career declined in the_sound_era , and ended_following a_romantic_scandal in the_1940s .
